means: [医]水蚤属：一种淡水甲壳纲动物，名水蚤，常用于生物学研究

sentence.Network_en: Under normal environmental conditions, Daphnia populations are exclusively female and reproduction is clonal.

以溞属(Daphnia)最常见，遍布欧洲和北美的池塘、河流中。水蚤体小，长约0.5∼3.0公厘(0.02∼0.12寸)。

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Greek Daphnē, from the name of the nymph daphne

means.word_mean: 1. minute freshwater crustacean having a round body enclosed in a transparent shell; moves about like a flea by means of hairy branched antennae
